 Somebody will come back to you in a few days with more information.

One more thing, we would really like the same key terminology to be present in both English and French, that is:
- Contracting Entity

It looks like you got the document finalized, so we will proceed ahead. However, we would like you to double-around and make sure we omit any extra words that is redundant entries present from the first responses. You did a fantastic job but would you be willing to apply a tiny make adjustments?

We would like the picture attached, otherwise, nothing is wrong with your helpful piece of work, also please make sure that the address is fully standardized according to the federal government’s address rules in the pivotal definition.
